short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help users use and understand CSS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When a user clicks on an element of a webpage by clicking on the icon, this extension can retrieve the CSS statement for that element, such as' width, height, background color ', and display it to help users better understand CSS
